site.name: Euro Agri Trading s.r.o — EU-Based Rock Phosphate Sourcing
hero.title: EU-Based Rock Phosphate Sourcing & Structured Execution
hero.subtitle: Shipment-verified compliance. Controlled documentation. Multi-origin coordination.
hero.desc: We coordinate structured sourcing of rock phosphate between verified suppliers and qualified buyers, supported by shipment-specific third-party documentation and EU-aligned trade execution.
hero.specsNote: Rock Phosphate — Multi-origin supply with shipment-specific COA.
hero.productsOnRequest: Additional supply lines available upon request.
hero.tradeNote: Execution framework: LC at sight • SGS/Intertek/BV inspection • shipment-specific documentation
products.title: Flagship Product
products.lead: Rock Phosphate — Grades 18–32% P₂O₅ (subject to availability & shipment-specific COA) (reference sample: 26%)
products.spec1: Screened granulometry — ready for milling or direct application
products.spec2: Specification sheet included; buyer-specific analyses available
products.note: Additional products available upon structured request and verification.
products.secondaryLead: Secondary supply lines are coordinated upon confirmed demand and aligned documentation requirements.
trust.title: EU-based execution.
trust.text: LC at sight • Independent inspection (SGS/Intertek/BV) • shipment-specific COA • verified documentation.
core.rp.title: Rock Phosphate — Structured Multi-Origin Supply
core.rp.text: EU-based coordination of rock phosphate sourcing with shipment-specific COA validation and independent inspection options where contractually agreed.
core.rp.s3: Low-Cd grades available subject to shipment COA confirmation
cat.wsf.title: Water-Soluble Fertilizers (WSF)
cat.wsf.text.short: Fertigation-grade NPK WSF supplied upon structured demand and shipment-specific COA.
cat.cn.title: Calcium Nitrate
cat.cn.text.short: Calcium Nitrate coordinated for open-field and fertigation use, with shipment-level documentation.
cat.micro.title: Micronutrients
cat.micro.text.short: Selected micronutrients supplied upon request with grade-specific documentation.
cat.micro.s1.short: Zn / Fe / Mn / B / Cu / Mo
services.title: Structured Trade & Execution Services
services.agro.text: Primary focus on structured rock phosphate sourcing, aligning origin allocation, grade validation, and documentation control for EU-bound transactions.
services.quality.text: Independent third-party inspection (SGS / Intertek / BV) may be coordinated at loading to validate shipment parameters as contractually required.
services.analysis.text: Review and alignment of COA, heavy metals analysis, Certificate of Origin, and commercial documentation to support EU import and regulatory compliance.
about.title: About Us
about.p1: Euro Agri Trading s.r.o. is an EU-based sourcing and transaction coordination company with a primary focus on structured rock phosphate supply.
about.pricing: We coordinate verified supply lines and align shipment documentation to support secure and transparent execution.
about.p2: Independent third-party inspection and shipment-specific COA validation can be arranged upon request, subject to contractual agreement.
about.p3: The company is registered in the Czech Republic and operates in alignment with applicable EU trade and regulatory frameworks.
about.note: Euro Agri Trading s.r.o. is not a contracting party to the sales contract between seller and buyer. Contractual obligations are agreed directly between the transacting parties.
